alert.note: Alert for Dallas (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 17 at 9:11PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Dallas County through 945 PM CDT... At 911 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Central Mills to near Dannelly Reservoir. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orrville, Old Cahaba Park, Bogue Chitto, Dannelly Reservoir, Marion Junction, Central Mills, Skyharbor Airport, Whites Bluff, Crumptonia, Safford and Hazen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
